With precise aim, you target ${targetName}'s ${location}. ${opening} your your ${weaponType} ${verb}. ${effect}

failure.pattern: ${targetName} evades as ${opening} your ${weaponType} finds only empty air where ${targetName}'s ${location} had been.
Targeting ${targetName}'s ${location}, your attack goes wide. ${opening} The strike misses its mark.
Your ${weaponType} fails to connect with ${targetName}. ${opening} The moment passes.
Fortune favors ${targetName} as ${opening} your attack fails.
${opening} ${targetName} shifts at the last second! Your ${weaponType} sweeps past ${location} without contact.
Close but not close enough! ${opening} your attack misses ${targetName}'s ${location}.
You misjudge the distance. ${opening} your ${weaponType} fails to reach ${targetName}'s ${location}.
${targetName} anticipates the strike! ${opening} your ${weaponType} meets only air.
${opening} you strike where ${targetName} was, not where they are. The attack misses.

${opening} ${targetName}'s defense holds! your strike misses ${location} entirely.
You extend too far! ${opening} your ${weaponType} misses ${targetName} as balance falters.
${opening} Poor positioning costs you the strike. Your ${weaponType} fails to connect with ${targetName}'s ${location}.

criticalFailure.pattern: ${opening} but your attack against ${targetName} goes disastrously astray!
